EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response when new lead is submitted online.
EmailTemplate.name: Web-to-Lead email response - Español
EmailTemplate.subject: Gracias por su interés en Infopaginas
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name},
We appreciate your interest in Infopaginas. Please allow 12-24 hours for responses by Telephone or E-mail.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at marketing@infopaginas.com
For any other immediate information regarding products or services, please visit our website www.infopaginasmedia.com
Best Regards,
Infopaginas Team
